page.title: 05SURRENDEN CERAMICS PRODUCTS
page.content: Surrenden Ceramics is a small two man business specializing in enamel overglazing onto ceramic surfaces. Mr.Head and Mr. Chell are at present designing tiles to be used in London Underground stations. They have completed work for Leicester Square, Caledonian Road and Baker Street stations. The design they chose for Baker Street were silhouettes of Sherlock Holmes. The stations they are working on are Green Park, where they are printing a white trellis pattern on a green background and also Goodge Street which uses the Post Office Tower in its design. Tiles are chosen for the stations because they are virtually vandal proof and are easy to keep clean.
